actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 102-45.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 71.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the House.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 102-212.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 127.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-118.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to authorize the addition of 15 acres to Morristown National Historical Park.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the addition of certain lands to Morristown National Historical Park, New Jersey.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the addition of 15 acres to Morristown National Historical Park.
